ResearchTabDef.label: beyond
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock solar, quasaric, tenebrite, and umbra technologies by researching at a hi-tech research bench. You can only have one active project at a time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a solar analyzer, which uses advanced models of this world's sun to aid research and unlock solar-tier research projects. Explore the hellish corona of a star or simulate the effects of supernovae on spacecraft. Reverse-engineer the secrets of Solar Republic society.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nuclear metallurgy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: strong force manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can control the electromagnetic force with the literal flick of a switch; why stop at mastery over one fundamental force? Harness the strong nuclear force to stitch neutrons into the ultradense material Neutronium. Imagine, a sliver of a neutron star in our own backyard!

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic optimized n-synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can control the electromagnetic force with the literal flick of a switch; why stop at mastery over one fundamental force? ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laborless quark brew
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano Clusters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some places are too small for human hands, too narrow for human minds, too fast for human reflexes. That's where we use the nanoclusters, inert nanomachines springing into action on our every command.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutronium Refinery Tier 1
ResearchProjectDef.description: The very first step into automation of the Neutronium utilities, this refinery allows to create semi-advanced products, from Neutronium, automatically. It also unlocks the entire industry of transporting and storing Neutronium with the use of Starsteel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Temperature-dependent Tier 1 Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise alternative processing methods that take half the ingredients, but are very susceptible to temperature deviations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pico Clusters
ResearchProjectDef.description: When Nanoclusters are too big is where the science begins to feel like magic. Picoclusters contain machines and contraptions carved in atoms themselves, boldly going where nothing else will fit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutronium Refinery Tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Bold lunge into Neutronium automation, allows to construct even more complex refineries that are more space- and time-efficient.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Temperature-ruinable Tier II Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new processing methods, dependent on the temperature.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Femto Clusters
ResearchProjectDef.description: In the realms of quantum particles, even picotechnology seems ridiculously big. Thanks to our advancements, we can know produce the ultimate machines, that don't even need atoms to work. This allows us to strip the reality to its barebones and rebuild it anew to our liking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutronium Refinery Tier 3
ResearchProjectDef.description: Final leap into automation of creation with neutronium, this refinery is the most efficient possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Temperature-ruinable Tier III refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new refining methods that operate in sub-zero temperatures but use half the ingredients.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infinite Neutronium Reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through sheer luck have we stumbled into a way to start a self-sustaining Neutronium draw. Utilizing tremendous power and our finest materials, we can create a beacon for Neutronium to feed our networks, to allow unprecedented efficiency in automation.
